briefTitle: Mindfulness and Cancer Mamma - Clinical Trial MBSR Among Women Operated for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Prospective, Randomized Controlled Trial of Mindfulness-based Stress Reduction (MBSR) Among Women Operated for Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women 18-75 years
* operated for breast cancer stage I-III at either Herlev hospital (F-118) or Ringsted sygehus (Mammakirurgisk Klinik) after september 2006
* speak and read danish

Exclusion Criteria:

* other cancers
* diseases or disabilities hindering MBSR-participation
* active treatment for psychiatric disease including alcohol abuse
